trans-unit.resname: PR23·1 | Mystical Dispute | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a blue spell.
trans-unit.target: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a blue spell.

trans-unit.resname: PR23·1 | Mystical Dispute | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
trans-unit.target: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

trans-unit.resname: PR23·2 | Snapcaster Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PR23·2 | Snapcaster Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

trans-unit.resname: PR23·3 | Thing in the Ice | Card Name
PR23·3 | Thing in the Ice | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PR23·3 | Thing in the Ice | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with four ice counters on it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with four ice counters on it.

trans-unit.resname: PR23·3 | Thing in the Ice | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, remove an ice counter from CARDNAME. Then if it has no ice counters on it, transform it.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, remove an ice counter from CARDNAME. Then if it has no ice counters on it, transform it.

trans-unit.resname: PR23·3 | Awoken Horror | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When this creature transforms into CARDNAME, return all non-Horror creatures to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: When this creature transforms into CARDNAME, return all non-Horror creatures to their owners' hands.
